Hoover.WBHK: WBHK (98.7 FM, "98.7 Kiss FM") is an urban adult contemporary music formatted radio station owned by Summit Media that serves Birmingham, Alabama. It is currently ranked by the Arbitron rating system as the nation's highest rated urban adult contemporary station. 98.7 Kiss FM is licensed to Warrior and broadcasts on the 98.7 Megahertz (MHz) frequency at effective radiated power of 39 kilowatts (kW) from atop of Red Mountain.
